## Maximize Jira's Potential with ChatGPT: Seamless Integrations, Effortless
Collaboration, Streamlined Workflows

### Seamless Integration of ChatGPT in Jira Workflow

Seamlessly integrate ChatGPT into Jira. Get intelligent responses, suggestions
& insights, enhancing collaboration & issue management.

### Effortless Knowledge Sharing

Foster collaborative problem-solving using ChatGPT. Share project insights,
tips, and best practices seamlessly across your Jira team.

### Natural Language Interaction

Revolutionize Jira interactions with natural language communication. No more
complex queries—ChatGPT understands your intent quickly.

### More details

This plug-and-play solution effortlessly brings ChatGPT's language
capabilities into your Jira environment, enabling users to interact using
natural language queries and receive intelligent responses:

  * Offers context-aware insights and helpful suggestions, enhancing decision-making processes. 
  * Team members can easily share ideas, request feedback, and brainstorm collaboratively, fostering a more inclusive and productive work environment. 
  * Users can interact with ChatGPT using natural language queries, and the language model provides intelligent responses to their questions and requests with accurate and relevant answers. 

With AI deeply integrated into your Jira workflow, teams can benefit from
intelligent insights, streamlined issue management, and enhanced
collaboration, ultimately improving overall productivity and project success.

### Privacy and security

The Privacy and Security tab provides detailed information on the privacy,
security, data handling, and compliance practices followed by this app.

Privacy and security information not provided by the partner.

### Integration Details

ChatGPT Integration for Jira integrates with your Atlassian product. This
remote service can:

  * View user information in Jira that the user has access to, including usernames, email addresses, and avatars.
  * Read Jira project and issue data, search for issues, and objects associated with issues like attachments and worklogs.
  * View the profile details for the currently logged-in user.
